sentences.sentence: Ceilidh, a kind of dancing party with folk music. Typical Scottish folk dances include jigs, reels and "the Gay Gordons".
sentences.translation: “同乐会”是一种以民间音乐为伴奏乐的舞会。典型的苏格兰民间舞蹈包括快步舞、里尔舞和“快乐戈登”舞。

sentences.sentence: The cute animal sound effects will keep you amused and the folk music of the Monster Ceilidh Band will keep your feet tapping.
sentences.translation: 可爱的动物的声音效果将让你逗乐，让你的脚攻的的怪物同乐会乐队的民间音乐。
